title: I cant login to my account
body: I cant login to my account on the launcher and idk why

replies.body: Are you getting any error messages?  Do you get to the login screen at all?  Let me know with some more details, and I'll be glad to help!
also i can get to the login screen
Thanks!  What does the error message say when trying to login?  Are you connected to your own region (NA)?

im on the right region
the error message says "An unexpected error has occured while logging in. Please try again."
